about_the_game:
How would you like to spend time in good company in virtual reality? Maybe talk about something or put together a couple of puzzles?

So why not put on your VR headset and start solving puzzles with your friends today? It's a fun and engaging way to spend your time, and who knows, you might even learn something new along the way!

In this game, you can choose one of two types of full-body avatars and go to collect a large number of different puzzles with beautiful pictures. The difficulty of the puzzles gradually increases, but you can always call your friends for help. At the same time, the level of interactivity is on top. Communicate with voice and gestures, pass puzzle pieces to each other, correct friends' mistakes and don't hesitate to ask them for help.
The game has an unobtrusive minimalist design that helps you concentrate on completing the puzzle. If you have any difficulties, you can always use the hint on your wristwatch.
Great way to have a good time.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • VR Support: OpenXR: with Oculus Touch, Valve index, HTC Vive controllers
